subject: Initial Discovery Call
notes: Great conversation about their current workflow challenges. Sarah mentioned they're using 5 different tools and losing productivity in context switching. Scheduled follow-up demo.

subject: Product Demo Follow-up
notes: Sent detailed proposal with pricing breakdown and implementation timeline. Included case studies from similar-sized companies in their industry.

subject: Technical Architecture Review
notes: Deep dive session with their CTO and engineering team. Reviewed our API capabilities, security features, and integration options. Very positive reception.

subject: Pricing Discussion
notes: Emma expressed concerns about budget constraints. Discussed our startup-friendly pricing and growth plans. She's waiting for Series A funding round to close.

subject: Compliance Documentation
notes: Sent SOC 2 reports, security whitepaper, and compliance documentation requested by their legal team. David confirmed they're moving forward with evaluation process.

subject: Contract Signing & Onboarding
notes: Fantastic meeting! Lisa signed the annual contract and we kicked off the onboarding process. Their team is excited to get started with our design collaboration features.

subject: Quarterly Business Review
notes: Check-in call with Sarah to discuss their usage and satisfaction. Team is seeing 40% productivity improvement. Discussed potential expansion to other departments.

subject: Feature Request Follow-up
notes: Michael requested advanced reporting capabilities for their enterprise setup. Forwarded to product team and provided timeline for upcoming releases.
